lawyer: an individual that prosecutes or defends one in court
jwt: JSON Web TOKEN. It is a means of representing claims between two parties. It consist of Header, Payload and Signature. Header ---> Type of token and signing algorithm used. Payload ---> Contains user/entity info such as id, role etc. Signature ---> Verifies sender if they are genuine. An example --->eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJzdWIiOiIxMjM0NTY3ODkwIiwibmFtZSI6IkpvaG4gRG9lIiwiaWF0IjoxNTE2MjM5MDIyfQ.SflKxwRJSMeKKF2QT4fwpMeJf36POk6yJV_adQssw5c
